Detailed Description

Application (starts the GUI and manages the event loop). We do not really need to use DeletableOutOfLua here but we never know.

Bindings info:
lib_name:'Application_core' constructor: 'MakeApplication' destructor: 'luaDestroy' ignore: 'event' super: 'QObject'
